author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at the Solo Leveling: Karma reveal trailer for the upcoming roguelite action RPG that expands upon the universe of the Solo Leveling anime series. The Solo Leveling: Karma trailer shows combat against formidable Magic Beasts, featuring The Gatekeeper of Hell Ceberus, Hobgoblin Leader, Avaricious Vulcan, The Demonic King Baran, and the Godlike Statue of Cartenon Temple. Solo Leveling: Karma will be available on PC and mobile

Solo Leveling: Karma introduces an original storyline set in the Dimensional Gap — an unexplored narrative window within the source material — where protagonist Sung Jinwoo endures a 27-year-long war among Monarchs. At the heart of this epic is the "Broken Cup of Reincarnation," an artifact that can only be restored through Jinwoo’s fragmented memories.
title: Solo Leveling: Karma - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description: Check out a full match of the Eye of Misra map/mode in Mecha Break, the brand new free-to-play Mech game from developers Seasun Games. This video showcases Falcon, a speedy transforming mech that can go from standard bipedal mech mode, to a free flying jet plane.
title: 9 Minutes of Mecha Break Gameplay - 4K 60FPS

author: IGN
description:
Death Stranding 2 hides a nod to a classic arcade game… if you know where to look. In this video, we show you how one quirky delivery leads to an unexpected surprise tucked deep inside the game. It’s retro, it’s bizarre, and yes – it’s playable.

Spoiler Warning Below
Deliver a package to the Pizza Chef in Death Stranding 2 and you’ll be rewarded with a very familiar-looking pizza. After the delivery, the Ring Terminal lights up, the iconic Pac-Man theme starts playing, and you’re suddenly transported into a fully playable version of Pac-Man – Death Stranding-style. Set on the Australian map, this version has Pac-Man dodging and taking down BTs in classic arcade fashion. It’s one of Kojima’s wildest (and most delightful) surprises yet.
title: A Classic Arcade Game Is Secretly Tucked Inside Death Stranding 2 | DS2 Easter Egg

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Sink Your Teeth: A Tokyo Ghoul Celebration trailer for this upcoming compilation film, showcasing select episodes from season one of the supernatural horror anime series. Tokyo Ghoul follows the story of Ken Kaneki, a quiet college student who becomes a ghoul after a freak accident with his date, Rize Kamishiro, goes wrong. 

Sink Your Teeth: A Tokyo Ghoul Celebration features six select episodes from Season One. Ken Kaneki is a loner. In a world where ghouls—human-like creatures who survive on human flesh—and people are at war, his biggest concern is which novel to pick up next. But when a date with the mysterious Rize turns deadly, a lifesaving operation horrifyingly transforms him into a human-ghoul hybrid. Can he find his place in a society where it’s hunt or be hunted?

Sink Your Teeth: A Tokyo Ghoul Celebration is directed by Shuhei Morita. It is based on the manga series by the same name, written and illustrated by Sui Ishida. It is produced by Studio Pierrot.

Cr
title: Sink Your Teeth: A Tokyo Ghoul Celebration - Official Trailer (2025)

author: IGN
description:
Cyberpunk: Edgerunners 2 presents a new standalone 10-episode story from the world of Cyberpunk 2077— a raw chronicle of redemption and revenge. In a city that thrives in the spotlight of violence, one question remains: when the world is blinded by spectacle, what extremes do you have to go to make your story matter? Director Kai Ikarashi (Cyberpunk: Edgerunners, SSSS.Gridman) brings a bold, cinematic vision to the series, supported by the lead character designer Kanno Ichigo (Promare, Cyberpunk: Edgerunners). They're joined by returning collaborators Masahiko Otsuka (Gurren Lagann, Promare) and Hugo Award winner Bartosz Sztybor as Showrunner, Story Writer, and Producer. 
Cyberpunk: Edgerunners 2 is created in collaboration with CD PROJEKT RED and animation studio TRIGGER, with a planned release on Netflix in the future.

#CyberpunkEdgerunners #IGN #Cyberpunk2077
title: Cyberpunk: Edgerunners 2 - Official Teaser Trailer | Netflix

author: IGN
description: Watch the Fantastic Four July 2025 Developer Update Overview for Marvel Snap, the free-to-play hit mobile strategy card collecting battle game developed by Second Dinner Studios. With the upcoming arrival of The Fantastic Four to the MCU with The Fantastic Four: First Steps, fans can get a taste of the new Marvel Snap season inspired by Marvel's first family. Get the rundown on the new look and amazing new designs of the incoming cards for Marvel Snap, such as Herbie, Human Torch, and more cards inspired by The Fantastic Four: First Steps. The Fantastic Four July 2025 Developer Update is available now for Marvel Snap for iOS, Android, and PC.
title: Marvel Snap - Official Fantastic Four Update Overview

Deadeye comes to Black Desert on July 10 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X|S, with the class already available on PC.
title: Black Desert - Official Deadeye Main Trailer

description:

#Borderlands4 #Gaming #IGN

author: IGN
description:
It’s no secret that Blue Prince has many, well… secrets. With the bulk of the game’s puzzles presenting themselves after you’ve rolled credits for the first time, some players unfortunately will never know just how deep this blue rabbit hole goes. With this guide, we'll help you reach Room 46 and quote unquote “beat the game,” though you'll need to figure out all those post-credit puzzles yourself.
Presented by the NHTSA. Speeding catches up with you.

00:00 - Intro
00:59 - Blue Prince Basics
02:05 - 3 Rooms to Remember
02:57 - How to Unlock the Antechamber
06:36 - How to Unlock the Basement
09:16 - How to Reach Room 46

#IGN
title: How to Actually Beat Blue Prince: A Complete Guide

author: IGN
description:
Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3 + 4 reviewed by Luke Reilly on PlayStation 5. Also available on PlayStation 4, Xbox, PC, and Switch/Switch 2.

"Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3 + 4 is a largely successful rejuvenation of the acclaimed 2001 and 2002 originals, and another very welcome time capsule of everything great about the golden age of early 2000s gaming – before microtransactions and battle passes botched everything right up. Like 2020’s 1 + 2 before it, THPS 3 + 4 proves again the series’ over-the-top skateboarding formula is totally timeless and remains suitable for all skill levels; simple at first blush, but extraordinarily sophisticated beneath the surface for those with the minerals (or the muscle memory) to push their combos to colossal levels. However, syncing THPS4 with the classic two-minute timer of the initial trilogy is probably going to be a sore point with fans who strongly regard the series’ fourth installment as their favourite, and discarding a whopping 80% of the original THP
title: Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3 + 4 Review

description:

author: IGN
description:
We are finally getting another addition to Nintendo's 3D platforming library – Donkey Kong: Bananza. It’ll slot into a collection that contains some of the most celebrated games in Nintendo history (as well as a couple of rare misses). Now’s a great time to look back on these games and analyse which ones still feel great to control, and which have been aged out of the pantheon of Nintendo’s greatest hits. 

From the best 3D Mario games to Captain Toad, Kirby and the best of the rest, here’s every Nintendo 3D platformer, ranked.

#ign #nintendo #mario
title: The Top 11 Best Nintendo 3D Platformers

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Release Date Announcement Trailer for The House of the Dead 2: Remake, a new version of a classic rail-shooter title developed by MegaPixel Studio. Players will embody the role of a secret agent as James or Gary, or team up in co-op mode to neutralize the dangerous creatures standing in the way. The game is equipped with remastered music, modern graphics, different endings, new game modes, and more to accommodate the modern era. The House of the Dead 2: Remake is launching on August 7 for Nintendo Switch and PC (Steam and GoG).

#TheHouseOfTheDead2Remake #Gaming #IGN
title: The House of the Dead 2: Remake - Official Release Date Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out nine minutes of exclusive gameplay from the 'Villa' section in Chapter 5 of Mafia: The Old Country, the upcoming narrative-driven action-adventure prequel in the Mafia series, set in early-1900s Sicily. Stay tuned every Monday in July for IGN's Mafia Mondays, where we'll have exclusive content from The Old Country, including the world's first hands-on preview next week.

Note: This footage is edited for length and to avoid some story/character spoilers.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Mafia: The Old Country – 9 Minutes of Exclusive Gameplay | IGN First

author: IGN
description:
Sundays at 7, on the dot, no matter what. Watch this new clip from Marvel Studios’ The Fantastic Four: First Steps!

The Fantastic Four: First Steps stars Pedro Pascal, Vanessa Kirby, Joseph Quinn, Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Ralph Ineson, and Julia Garner. The Fantastic Four: First Steps opens in theaters on July 25, 2025.

Set against the vibrant backdrop of a 1960s-inspired, retro- futuristic world, Marvel Studios’ The Fantastic Four: First Steps introduces Marvel’s First Family—Reed Richards/Mister Fantastic (Pedro Pascal), Sue Storm/Invisible Woman (Vanessa Kirby), Johnny Storm/Human Torch (Joseph Quinn) and Ben Grimm/The Thing (Ebon Moss-Bachrach) as they face their most daunting challenge yet. Forced to balance their roles as heroes with the strength of their family bond, they must defend Earth from a ravenous space god called Galactus (Ralph Ineson) and his enigmatic Herald, Silver Surfer (Julia Garner). And if Galactus’ plan to devour the entire planet and everyone on it weren’t bad
title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps - Official 'Sunday Dinner' Clip (2025) Pedro Pascal, Vanessa Kirby
